overview: Rapper Mystikal takes you on a wild ride deep into the heart of the West Coast scene in this documentary that goes behind the scenes of his CD release party and offers a revealing glimpse of hip-hop excess at its most outrageous. See for yourself what goes on in those private parties where the music pulses, the women dance seductively and the pleasure flows freely. But be careful: once you've tasted the high life, there's no going back.
title: Liquid City 2
